description.message: This browser extension simplifies the process of registering downloaded assets from BOOTH into asset management tools.

toggleBulkRegisterLabel.message: Add all items with the same ID

saveFolderNotSet.message: The download folder is not set. Please configure it in the input field above.

confirmClearHistory.message: Are you sure you want to delete all history?

renewalNoticeDescription1.message: We are renewing this extension with future support for platforms beyond BOOTH in mind, as download history management is no longer our primary feature.

renewalNoticeDescription2.message: The new name 'Asset Connect' represents our vision to better connect assets with asset management tools.

renewalNoticeDescription3.message: We are also planning to implement a feature that will automatically copy tags to KonoAsset when purchasing full avatar sets.

renewalNoticeDescription4.message: The update is scheduled for Saturday, November 1st.
